name: Sauteed Summer Squash Side Dish
author: Sarah
summary: This is a quick and easy side dish that goes perfectly with meats, pastas, and fish. It is a saute of zucchini and summer squash.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon minced garlic, or more to taste
1  zucchini, sliced 1/4-inch thick, or more to taste
1  summer squash, sliced 1/4-inch thick, or more to taste
4 pinches dried Italian seasoning, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 teaspoon chopped fresh basil, or to taste
directions: Heat olive oil over medium heat in a medium-sized skillet, about 1 minute
Add scallions and garlic; saute in the hot oil until tender, 2 to 3 minutes
Add zucchini and squash; season with Italian seasoning, salt, and pepper
Saute until squash is tender, 8 to 12 minutes
